body_html: Well perhaps If I build from source in a Python 3.5 env rather than in the root Anaconda . Things might be better isolated.. and easier to create new environments.. going forward. I'll try that out tomorrow and report back 👍

body: Well perhaps If I build from source in a Python 3.5 env  rather than in the root Anaconda . Things might be better isolated.. and easier to create new environments.. going forward. I'll try that out tomorrow and report back :+1:
